import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core' import PublishIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Publish' import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ChatBubbleOutline' import VerifiedUserIcon from '@material-ui/icons/VerifiedUser' import RepeatIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Repeat' import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder' // import React, { forwardRef } from 'react' import './Post.css' function Post ( { displayName, username, verified, text, image, avatar }) { return (

{displayName} {verified && } @{username}

{text}

) } export default Post
